snippet: A team of legal and forensic experts concluded that post-mortem photographs, provided to the Syrian opposition by a man who describes himself as a defector from President Bashar al-Assad’s security forces, offer “direct evidence” of torture and...
abstract: A team of legal and forensic experts concluded that post-mortem photographs, provided to the Syrian opposition by a man who describes himself as a defector from President Bashar al-Assad’s security forces, offer “direct evidence” of torture and execution.

headline.main: War Crimes Experts Call Syrian Defector's Photographs 'Direct Evidence' of Assad's 'Killing Machine'

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
